text: @chuckwoolery @MaddenWini @gatewaypundit Of course! This is a clever way to keep people in fear. All deaths are labeled COVID-19 cases, even if they aren't, and for the increased number of people infected, it's all lies. They are in control, don't have to provide any proof, so they lie. They're all in cahoots together.
